qas.question: The author, Rex Stout, created a fictional detection that is fond of solving London Times' crossword puzzles that goes by what name?

The fictional detective, Nero Wolfe, preferred what newspaper to American newspapers?
The fictional detective, Nero Wolfe, is described as fond of solving what kind of puzzle in the London Times newspaper?

context: Rex Stout's fictional detective <a0_0>Nero Wolfe<a0_0/> is described as fond of solving the <a2_0>London Times<a2_0/>' <a3_0>crossword<a3_0/> puzzle at his <a1_0>New York<a1_0/> home, in preference to those of American papers.
